blur_detection.description: The image shows clear, sharp text throughout the invoice with well-defined edges and high legibility.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as text clarity is excellent for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The invoice displays excellent black text on white background with strong contrast ratio throughout the document.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: Maintain this level of contrast in future document captures.

glare_identification.description: No visible glare, reflections, or overexposed areas are present on the document surface.
glare_identification.recommendation: Continue using even, diffused lighting when capturing documents.

water_stains.description: No water damage, staining, or discoloration is present on the invoice.
water_stains.recommendation: Continue protecting documents from liquids and moisture.

tears_or_folds.description: The invoice appears flat with no visible creases, folds, tears or physical damage.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: Continue handling and storing documents carefully to avoid physical damage.

cut_off_detection.description: All edges of the document are fully visible with no content cut off from the frame.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: Maintain this complete framing approach when capturing documents.

missing_sections.description: The invoice references a 'next page for payment details' which is not included in the image.
missing_sections.recommendation: Capture all pages of multi-page documents to ensure complete information extraction.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows, or other obstructions are visible on the document surface.
obstructions.recommendation: Maintain this clean capture approach free of obstructions.
